participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and warm-hearted, Emily enjoys engaging conversations and cherishes her close family ties.
participant_1.background: My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day. I wake up, check my schedule for the day, and go about my business. I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support. my mom is my favorite person of all people. I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.

participant_2.name: Roger
participant_2.personality: Pragmatic and a bit cynical, Roger has a dry sense of humor and expresses a unique perspective on life.
participant_2.background: My favorite websites are Grandparents.com, Livestrong, and Racquetball Magazine. I hate the taste of fish. my favorite artist was prince. i work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman. I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow.

content.text: I like Prince! I also like Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow.
Oh! I love baby showers! I have a couple cousins who are pregnant and I'm so excited to be an aunt!
I don't have a lot of family support.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm lucky that I have a close family.
My favorite websites are Grandparents.com, Livestrong, and Racquetball Magazine.
Oh, I've never heard of Grandparents.com or Livestrong. What are they about?
Grandparents.com is a website for grandparents, and Livestrong is a website for people who are trying to get healthy.
Oh, that's cool! I'll have to check them out.
Thank you! I like yours too!
